formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: A DOMAIN ERROR in ModToNS[27] occurs with the following message.

listitem.screen: ModToNS[27] c fpv←FindFunction ee ⍵ 1 ⍝ Get function from LLVM Module

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: The above function has a domain error because ⍵ is 0 rather than a string. This can be traced back to the fill argument of an empty (name, type) environment, which the Parse function handles incorrectly. It uses ⍬ instead of MtNTE . This causes an incorrect detection of the empty cases in the Add function of ModToNS which in turn causes FindFunction to be called on bad data. The fix is to use the appropriate seed value for an empty (name, type) environment.
